question: Shashi Shekhar Vempati, who has been elected as the Vice President of Asia Pacific Broadcasting Union, is presently the CEO of which organization?
explanation:
The CEO of Prasar Bharati Shashi Shekhar Vempati has been elected as the Vice President of Asia Pacific Broadcasting Union (ABU). ABU is one of the largest broadcasting associations in the world. 
The election for the prestigious post was held virtually and Shashi Shekhar Vempati has been elected for a term of three years.
